name: L&F Hack Generator
description:
Instantly generate a Lasers & Feelings Hack!

Almost everything it produces will be meaningless trash, but that's where you come in. Can you take that trash and give it meaning?

If you do, please let me know! I want to see my trash soar!

Ideally, you should use this to generate a ruleset and immediately jump into a game.You will almost certainly need a dictionary. I have no clue what some of these words mean!

CONTENT WARNING: I did my best to go through and eliminate any words that might end up producing offensive content through the generator, however with more than 100,000 words grabbed from various sources I may have missed some things. Please let me know immediately if you come across something that I should see and I'll do my best to adjust the generator to avoid any repeats. Thank you so much for your understanding.

This content is available for free, but you can make a small donation right before or after trying it out. Every little bit helps me out. Thank you!

Vocabulary sources:

www.ashley-bovan.co.uk/words/partsofspeech.html

www.englishpost.org/transitive-verbs-list/

www.desiquintans.com/nounlist

www.behindthename.com (thanks to Emma for scraping names from the site! I love you!)

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_genres
